messages.body: Good morning. We need to place our monthly consolidated order.
Good morning. What items do you need?
KNM Coffee, Assam tea, copy paper, and hand sanitizer.
Quantities for each?
8 bags coffee, 20 boxes tea, 40 reams paper, 24 bottles sanitizer 500ml.
Coffee $25/bag, tea $12/box, paper $4/ream, sanitizer $8/bottle min 24.
Yes, single delivery. Preferred date December 5.
December 5 works. Delivery address?
100 Finance Ave Singapore 018989.
Noted. Can we get 5% for order above $750? Brings it to $752.40.
Accepted. $768.24, one shipment Dec 5.
Our PO is PO-2024-12-002. Net 30 from delivery.
Confirmed. I'll generate the sales order for all four lines.
Tea is 50 sachets per box, correct?
Yes, 50 sachets per box. Paper is A4 80gsm.
Good. Sanitizer is pump bottle?
Yes, 500ml pump. All standard specs.
Please send itemized invoice to procurement@company.com.
Will do. SO will list each product and line total.
Any lead time for paper? We need it by Dec 5.
All items will ship together. Dec 5 confirmed.
Understood. Single delivery for all four products.
SO-2024-1202. Coffee, tea, paper, sanitizer. One DO for Dec 5.
Received. FOB Singapore?
Yes, FOB Singapore. Freight to your account if you need separate logistics.
We'll use your delivery. Same as last month.
Morning slot 9-12. We'll confirm 48 hours before.
Contact at receiving: +65 9123 4567.
Noted. Anything else on this order?
No. That's everything.
Thank you. We'll send the delivery note on Dec 5.
Thanks. Bye.
Bye.
Quick check — 8 coffee, 20 tea, 40 paper, 24 sanitizer, total $768.24.
Correct. All confirmed.
Good.
If you need to add anything, let us know before Dec 2.
Will do.
Reminder: order cut-off for Dec 5 is Dec 2 noon. No changes after that.
Understood. We have you down for the full four-line order.
Billing contact remains finance@company.com?
Yes. Invoice will be sent there post-delivery.
Good. Thanks.
You're welcome.
Can we get a packing list with the delivery?
Yes. Driver will have delivery note and packing list.
Perfect. That's all.
Good day.
You too. Bye.
Bye.
